meanings.sent1: Last night, I had a sweven about flying through the clouds.
meanings.sent2: Her sweven was so vivid, she thought it was real.
meanings.sent3: In his sweven, he was a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent4: The sweven of a peaceful world stayed with her long after waking up.
meanings.sent5: The sweven of winning the lottery felt almost tangible.

meanings.definition: To dream or have a vision.
meanings.sent1: I often sweven of exploring ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: She swevened of becoming a famous singer one day.
meanings.sent3: He would sweven about talking animals having a tea party.
meanings.sent4: Swevening of a bright future, she felt hopeful.
meanings.sent5: Swevening of success, he worked hard to achieve his goals.
